content: In the world of Harry Potter, what is the name of the mythical object that can turn any metal into pure gold and produce the Elixir of Life?

In the Harry Potter series, the mythical object you're referring to is called the Philosopher's Stone in British editions or the Sorcerer's Stone in American editions. It has the power to turn any metal into pure gold and can also produce the Elixir of Life, which grants eternal life. The stone plays a central role in the first book and movie of the series, "Harry Potter and the Philosopher's/Sorcerer's Stone."
